entities.name: teddy lupin
entities.description: Teddy Lupin is mentioned as the one who is snogging Victoire. He is also referred to as 'our Teddy' and 'cousin', indicating that he is a family member.

entities.name: victoire
entities.description: Victoire is mentioned as the person with whom Teddy Lupin is snogging. She is referred to as 'our Victoire' and 'cousin', indicating that she is a family member.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned in the conversation, criticizing James for interrupting Teddy and Victoire. She is referred to as though she is like Ron, suggesting that she has similar traits or behaviors.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned in the conversation, with Ginny comparing herself to him. This suggests that Ron is a known entity in the context of the story.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is mentioned in the conversation, reporting on what Teddy told him about his intentions towards Victoire. He seems worried that he has not made himself clear.

relationships.description: Teddy Lupin is snogging Victoire, as reported by James and witnessed by James. This relationship is described in the text as Teddy's intention to 'see her oï¬€'.
